scenario_description: Harry went to the sock every day to relax and watch the sunset. He always enjoyed watching the sun disappear over the horizon. one day someone was sitting on his bench and he was a little upset. When he went to confront the person, he discovered it was a woman. He talked with her instead and made a good friend.

action_plan: Ask(Harry, Woman, question="May I join you?")
Invite(Harry, Woman, proposal="Do you want to come watch the sunset with me again sometime?")

emotion_condition: ACTION(Harry, expressHisInitialFrustration), Talk(Harry, Woman, aboutSunsets), Distress
ACTION(Harry, makeSmallTalk), Talk(Harry, Woman, aboutSunsets), Joy
Move(Harry, bench, targetLocation=nextToWoman), Ask(Harry, Woman, question="May I join you?"), Hope
Invite(Harry, Woman, proposal="Do you want to come watch the sunset with me again sometime?"), Hope
Greet, Ask, None, None, "Excuse me, but is something wrong?"
Ask, Listen, None, None, "Just wondering why you're sitting on my bench."
Listen, Anger, Anger, None, "I come here every day and it's my spot. I was upset to see someone sitting here."
IF(BEL(Harry, benchIsReservedForHim) = False), ACTION(Harry, reserveBench)(A2), None, None

occ_emotion: Speak(B1, B2, None, None), None, Joy, None, "Oh, I'm sorry! I didn't realize someone owned this bench."

emotion_condition: Greet(Woman, Harry), None, Joy, None, "Hi there! Nice evening today."

occ_emotion: Speak(B6, B7, None, None), None, Joy, None, "Nice to meet you, Harry."
Speak, End, None, None, "That sounds nice. I'll have to come back and join you sometime."

dialogue_tree: <Start, B1, None, None, "Excuse me, that's my bench. Can you please move?">
<B1, B2, None, None, "Oh, I'm sorry! I didn't realize someone owned this bench.">
<B2, B3, None, None, "It's okay. I just like to come here every day and watch the sunset.">
<B3, B4, None, None, "It's a beautiful view, isn't it?">
<B4, B5, None, None, "Yes, it is. My name is Harry, by the way.">
<B5, B6, None, None, "Nice to meet you, Harry. I'm Sarah.">
<B6, B7, None, None, "So, what brings you here to the bench?">
<B7, B8, None, None, "Just to relax and enjoy the view. I come here every day.">
<B8, End, None, None, "That sounds nice. I'll have to come back and join you sometime.">
